TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CaseInsensitiveComparer extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IComparer

summary.span: 比较两个对象是否相等，比较时忽略字符串的大小写。

span.span: Compares two objects for equivalence, ignoring the case of strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口一样支持字符串，不区分大小写比较实现可支持不区分大小写的比较在字符串上的接口。 implements the interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings, just as implements the interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings. 类是的默认实现接口，并在执行区分大小写的字符串比较。The class is the default implementation of the interface and performs case-sensitive string comparisons. 用作键，即可通过对象需重写方法 (或接口) 和方法 (或接口)。The objects used as keys by a are required to override the method (or the interface) and the method (or the interface). 方法或接口的实现必须处理区分大小写相同的方式;否则为可能出现错误的行为。The implementation of both methods or interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the might behave incorrectly. 例如，在创建，你必须使用与此类类或任何不区分大小写实现。For example, when creating a , you must use this class with the class or any case-insensitive implementation. 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个区分大小写的哈希表和不区分大小写的哈希表，并演示其行为中的差异，即使它们都包含相同的元素。The following code example creates a case-sensitive hash table and a case-insensitive hash table and demonstrates the difference in their behavior, even if both contain the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CPP/caseinsensitive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CS/caseinsensitive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/VB/caseinsensitive.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 使用当前线程的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the of the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用此构造函数，创建实例保存当前线程。When the instance is created using this constructor, the of the current thread is saved. 比较过程使用的已保存的区域性来确定排序顺序和大小写规则;因此，字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the sort order and casing rules; therefore, string comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个区分大小写的哈希表和不区分大小写的哈希表，并演示其行为中的差异，即使它们都包含相同的元素。The following code example creates a case-sensitive hash table and a case-insensitive hash table and demonstrates the difference in their behavior, even if both contain the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CPP/caseinsensitive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CS/caseinsensitive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/VB/caseinsensitive.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定的比较过程来确定排序顺序和大小写规则。Comparison procedures use the specified to determine the sort order and casing rules. 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个区分大小写的哈希表和不区分大小写的哈希表，并演示其行为中的差异，即使它们都包含相同的元素。The following code example creates a case-sensitive hash table and a case-insensitive hash table and demonstrates the difference in their behavior, even if both contain the same elements. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CPP/caseinsensitive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/CS/caseinsensitive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CaseInsensitive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CaseInsensitive/VB/caseinsensitive.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int Compare (object a, object b);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Compare(object a, object b) cil managed
Public Function Compare (a As Object, b As Object) As Integer
public: virtual int Compare(System::Object ^ a, System::Object ^ b);

summary.span: 对同一类型的两个对象执行不区分大小写的比较，并返回一个值，指示其中一个对象是小于、等于还是大于另一个对象。

span.span: Performs a case-insensitive comparison of two objects of the same type and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.

returns.span: 一个有符号整数，指示 和 的相对值，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of and , as shown in the following table.

returns.span: 在忽略大小写的情况下， 小于 。

span.description: is less than , with casing ignored.

returns.span: 在忽略大小写的情况下， 等于 。
在忽略大小写的情况下， 大于 。

span.description: is greater than , with casing ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`a`和`b`两个字符串，此方法使用的是要比较的字符串大小写与忽略; 否则，它使用可能是对象的实现。If `a` and `b` are both strings, this method uses to compare the strings with the casing ignored; otherwise, it uses the implementation of either object. 也就是说，如果`a`实现，则此方法返回的结果`a`。That is, if `a` implements , then this method returns the result of `a`. `CompareTo` (`b`); 否则为如果`b`实现，然后它返回的求反后的结果`b`。`CompareTo` (`b`); otherwise, if `b` implements , then it returns the negated result of `b`. `CompareTo` (`a`).`CompareTo` (`a`). 比较`null`允许与任何类型和使用时不会生成异常。Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using . 在排序时，`null`被视为小于任何其他对象。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02).

exception.span: 和 都不实现 接口。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用无参数构造函数，创建实例保存当前线程。When the instance is created using the parameterless constructor, the of the current thread is saved. 比较过程使用的已保存的区域性来确定排序顺序和大小写规则;因此，字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the sort order and casing rules; therefore, string comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02).
